verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <S%H3050><s%> yah ye the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ט֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov for [it is] good זַמְּרָ֣ה <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Rah to sing praises אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; unto our God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נָ֝עִים <S%H5273><s%> Na-'im for [it is] pleasant נָאוָ֥ה <S%H5000><s%> na-Vah is comely תְהִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-Lah. [and] praise

בּוֹנֵ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> bo-Neh doth build up יְרוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; The LORD נִדְחֵ֖י <S%H1760><s%> nid-Chei the outcasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יְכַנֵּֽס׃ <S%H3664><s%> ye-chan-Nes. he gathereth together

הָ֭רֹפֵא <S%H7495><s%> Ha-ro-fe He healeth לִשְׁב֣וּרֵי <S%H7665><s%> lish-Vu-rei the broken לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev; in heart וּ֝מְחַבֵּ֗שׁ <S%H2280><s%> u-me-chab-Besh, and bindeth up לְעַצְּבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H6094><s%> le-'atz-tze-vo-Tam. their wounds

מוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H4487><s%> mo-Neh He telleth מִ֭סְפָּר <S%H4557><s%> Mis-por the number לַכּוֹכָבִ֑ים <S%H3556><s%> lak-ko-cha-Vim; of the stars לְ֝כֻלָּ֗ם <S%H3605><s%> le-chul-Lam, to all שֵׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot them all by [their] names יִקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> yik-Ra. he calleth

גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol Great אֲדוֹנֵ֣ינוּ <S%H113><s%> a-do-Nei-nu [is] our Lord וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> ve-rav- and of great כֹּ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach; power לִ֝תְבוּנָת֗וֹ <S%H8394><s%> lit-vu-na-To, his understanding אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein else מִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par. [is] infinite

מְעוֹדֵ֣ד <S%H5749><s%> me-'o-Ded lifteth up עֲנָוִ֣ים <S%H6035><s%> 'a-na-Vim the meek יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; The LORD מַשְׁפִּ֖יל <S%H8213><s%> mash-Pil down רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im the wicked עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> 'a-dei- eternity אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. to the ground

עֱנ֣וּ <S%H6030><s%> 'e-Nu Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD בְּתוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> be-to-Dah; with thanksgiving זַמְּר֖וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru sing praise לֵאלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hei-nu unto our God בְכִנּֽוֹר׃ <S%H3658><s%> ve-chin-Nor. upon the harp

הַֽמְכַסֶּ֬ה <S%H3680><s%> ham-chas-Seh Who covereth שָׁמַ֨יִם׀ <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim the heaven בְּעָבִ֗ים <S%H5645><s%> be-'a-Vim, with clouds הַמֵּכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> ham-me-Chin who prepareth לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz for the earth מָטָ֑ר <S%H4306><s%> ma-Tar; rain הַמַּצְמִ֖יחַ <S%H6779><s%> ham-matz-Mi-ach to grow הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim upon the mountains חָצִֽיר׃ <S%H2682><s%> cha-Tzir. who maketh grass

נוֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten He giveth לִבְהֵמָ֣ה <S%H929><s%> liv-he-Mah to the beast לַחְמָ֑הּ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mah; his food לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei [and] to the young עֹ֝רֵ֗ב <S%H6158><s%> 'o-Rev, ravens אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִקְרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> yik-Ra-'u. which cry

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not בִגְבוּרַ֣ת <S%H1369><s%> vig-vu-Rat not in the strength הַסּ֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> has-Sus of the horse יֶחְפָּ֑ץ <S%H2654><s%> yech-Patz; He delighteth לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not בְשׁוֹקֵ֖י <S%H7785><s%> ve-sho-Kei in the legs הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish of a man יִרְצֶֽה׃ <S%H7521><s%> yir-Tzeh. he taketh not pleasure

רוֹצֶ֣ה <S%H7521><s%> ro-Tzeh taketh pleasure יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> ye-re-'Av; in them that fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים <S%H3176><s%> ham-ya-cha-Lim him in those that hope לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> le-chas-Do. in his mercy

שַׁבְּחִ֣י <S%H7623><s%> shab-be-Chi Praise יְ֭רוּשָׁלִַם <S%H3389><s%> Ye-ru-sha-lim O Jerusalem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD הַֽלְלִ֖י <S%H1984><s%> hal-Li praise אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Ha-yich thy God צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon. O Zion

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for חִ֭זַּק <S%H2388><s%> Chiz-zak For he hath strengthened בְּרִיחֵ֣י <S%H1280><s%> be-ri-Chei the bars שְׁעָרָ֑יִךְ <S%H8179><s%> she-'a-Ra-yich; of thy gates בֵּרַ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> be-Rach he hath blessed בָּנַ֣יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Na-yich thy children בְּקִרְבֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bech. within

הַשָּׂם־ <S%H7760><s%> has-som- He maketh גְּבוּלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lech [in] thy borders שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom; peace חֵ֥לֶב <S%H2459><s%> Che-lev thee with the finest חִ֝טִּ֗ים <S%H2406><s%> chit-Tim, of the wheat יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽךְ׃ <S%H7646><s%> yas-bi-'Ech. [and] filleth

הַשֹּׁלֵ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> hash-sho-Le-ach He sendeth forth אִמְרָת֣וֹ <S%H565><s%> im-ra-To his commandment אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; [upon] earth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- very מְ֝הֵרָ֗ה <S%H4120><s%> me-he-Rah, very swiftly יָר֥וּץ <S%H7323><s%> ya-Rutz runneth דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ro. his word

הַנֹּתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> han-no-Ten He giveth שֶׁ֣לֶג <S%H7950><s%> She-leg snow כַּצָּ֑מֶר <S%H6785><s%> katz-Tza-mer; like wool כְּ֝פ֗וֹר <S%H3713><s%> ke-For, the hoarfrost כָּאֵ֥פֶר <S%H665><s%> ka-'E-fer like ashes יְפַזֵּֽר׃ <S%H6340><s%> ye-faz-Zer. he scattereth

מַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> mash-Lich He casteth forth קַֽרְח֣וֹ <S%H7140><s%> kar-Cho his ice כְפִתִּ֑ים <S%H6595><s%> che-fit-Tim; like morsels לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before קָ֝רָת֗וֹ <S%H7135><s%> ka-ra-To, cold מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יַעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod. who can stand

יִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> yish-Lach He sendeth out דְּבָר֣וֹ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ro his word וְיַמְסֵ֑ם <S%H4529><s%> ve-yam-Sem; and melteth יַשֵּׁ֥ב <S%H5380><s%> yash-Shev to blow ר֝וּח֗וֹ <S%H7307><s%> ru-Cho, them he causeth his wind יִזְּלוּ־ <S%H5140><s%> yiz-ze-lu- flow מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. [and] the waters

מַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> mag-Gid He sheweth; דְּבָרֹו de-va-rov כדְּבָרָ֣יו <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rav act קלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> le-ya-'a-Ko; unto Jacob חֻקָּ֥יו <S%H2706><s%> chuk-Kav his statutes וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטָ֗יו <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pa-Tav, and his judgments לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El. unto Israel

לֹ֘א <S%H3808><s%> lo has not עָ֤שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah He hath not dealt כֵ֨ן׀ <S%H3651><s%> chen thus לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol any גּ֗וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Goy, so with any nation וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֥ים <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pa-Tim and [as for his] judgments בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- have not יְדָע֗וּם <S%H3045><s%> ye-da-'Um, they have not known הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- them Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> Yah. ye the LORD
